meanings.definition: At or to a greater distance.
meanings.sent1: She ran farther than her friend.
meanings.sent2: He could see the finish line farther ahead.
meanings.sent3: The cat jumped farther than expected, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His voice carried farther than anyone else's in the room.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed farther downstream, disappearing into the horizon.

meanings.definition: More distant in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The farther planet in the solar system is Neptune.
meanings.sent2: The castle ruins are farther than I thought.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map led them to a farther island with hidden riches.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of childhood seemed farther away with each passing year.
meanings.sent5: The farther star in the sky twinkled brightly on a clear night.
